long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
My Perfect Hotel is an exciting hotel management simulation game where you can build and run a perfect hotel. With this Chrome extension, you can easily access and play the game right on your browser without having to install any software.

In the game, you will have to manage every aspect of the hotel from room design, interior decoration, providing services to customers to expanding and upgrading your hotel. Deal with challenges, take care of customers and build a classy 5-star hotel.
